Dominion [startdom]: 3

The Annunaki is a giant of divine heritage. She claims to be the Morning Star and she has powers over the earth, the sky and the stellar heavens. With the Pantokrator gone, there is no other being that can claim dominion over all three worlds. She is always accompanied by an owl.
